channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 16:00 Return the threat of a shelling in Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community. Salt for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 16:00 Return the threat of a shelling in Marganets and Marhanetsky territorial community. Salt for further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
